ObjectUserTerritory2View.name: ObjectUserTerritory2View
ObjectUserTerritory2View.description: Represents a user and object, such as an account or lead, assigned to a territory.

RoleInTerritory2.description: Role of the user assigned to the territory.

Territory2Id.description: ID of the territory to which the object and user are assigned.
